name: Small Turnip
description: Restores a small amount of HP. Automatically Consumed at Critical HP

name: Turnip
description: Restores some HP. Automatically Consumed at Critical HP

name: Big Turnip
description: Restores HP. Automatically Consumed at Critical HP

name: Mega Turnip
description: Restores a large amount of HP. Automatically Consumed at Critical HP

name: Beetroot
description: Removes minor status conditions. Automatically consumed when character is debuffed

name: Elixir
description: Restores 20% of targets HP and SP

name: Strong Elixir
description: Restores 50% of targets HP and SP

name: Elderberries
description: Recovers some SP. Automatically Consumed when attacked

name: Fulminating Phial
description: Thrown Weapon: Causes poison in a small AOE
